permissions: Admin users can update trailer credentials. Non-admin users can update when they are a manager of the trailer's trucker or broker and the tractor-trailer credential classification is within their policy scope.
side_effects: Updates issue and/or expiration dates for the specified trailer credential.
validation_notes: At least one of --issued-on or --expires-on must be provided. issued-on and expires-on must be in YYYY-MM-DD format when provided. expires-on must be on or after issued-on when both are set. Credentials cannot overlap existing credentials for the same trailer and classification.
